body: Lol, they actually tagged Titi as a character 🤣🤣

This guy does kemonomimi and loli grandma. What a god.
Also yeah like I_like_monstergirls said. Furries, monstergirls and kemonomimi are clearly different from each other.
Lola Bunny is a furry.
Lamias, centaurs and harpies are monster girls.
Catgirls from Nekopara are kemonomimi. Most things ended in "...girl" tend to belong to this group: cowgirl, foxgirl, doggirl, catgirl, etc (exceptions to the rule exist like slime girls).

@Wolf of the Saturn Six No, because furries are completely different from Monster Girls And Kemonomimis like, furries are animals with human traits like breasts And ability to stand on their Legs for an example like a werewolf, its body is Entirely (keyword "ENTIRELY") covered in fur now Search up "Wolf girl anime" And you'll see a HUMAN female only with such animal traits as ears And tail And that's it
